shrimp.name: FSNoise3D
shrimp.description: Filtered signed 3 dimensional perlin noise function
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: val
output.description: Noise value at p, in range -1 - 1

shrimp.usage: Filtered version of 3d signed noise. SNoise is exactly like Noise except that the result ranges from -1 to 1 rather than 0 to 1. The average value is therefore zero.
